title: Dating apps: How our brains react
description: What does our brain tell us to do when faced with a dating app?

vocabItems.definition: (here) moving the images on a smartphone or tablet up, down, left or right, using our finger
not giving someone the love and attention they would like
feel better after a bad experience
being positive and optimistic after a rejection or a bad experience
to manage / deal with (a difficult situation)
